Detailed Description

TREX variable representation.

This class implements a TREX variable. variables are used for representing any attribute of an Observation or Goal excahnged between reactors. They are represented by a symbolic name and its associated domain.

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

Definition at line 57 of file Variable.hh.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Variable::Variable (  ) 

Constructor.

Create an unnamed varaible with no domain.

Note:
This constructor is implemented only for allowing the support of the Varibale class for standard C++ containers. It should not be used by other components as it create an undefined variable

Definition at line 44 of file Variable.cc.

Variable::Variable ( rapidxml::xml_node<> const &  node  ) 

Constructor.

Parameters:
node A XML node

Create a new instance by parsing the content of node. This content should be similar to the following 

 <Variable name="<name>">
   domain
 </Variable>

Where <name> is a non empty string and domain is an XML domain description supported by DomainBase::xml_factory.

Exceptions:
Xmlerror name attribute was empty
XmlError domain was missing
XmlError An error occurred while parsing the domain

Variable& TREX::transaction::Variable::operator*= ( Variable const &  var  )  [inline]

Merge variable.

Parameters:
var another variable

This method tries to merge current insatnce with var

Precondition:
var should have the same name and domain type as current instance or one of them should not be complete
Exceptions:
VariableException the 2 variables does not have the same name
EmptyDomain the intersection of current instance domain with var domain is empty
Returns:
current insatnce after being merged with var
See also:
DomainBase &DomainBase::restrictWith(DomainBase const &)

Definition at line 233 of file Variable.hh.

Variable& TREX::transaction::Variable::operator*= ( DomainBase const &  dom  )  [inline]

Restrict Variable domain.

Parameters:
dom a domain

This method attempts to restrict current variable domain with dom. The resulting domain should be the intersection of dom with the current variable domain or simpluy a copy of dom if this varaible had no associated domain yet

Exceptions:
EmptyDomain the resulting domain is empty
Returns:
current instance after the operation
See also:
DomainBase &DomainBase::restrictWith(DomainBase const &)

Definition at line 110 of file Variable.cc.

template<class Ty >
Ty const& TREX::transaction::Variable::typedDomain (  )  const [inline]

Variable domain.

Template Parameters:
Ty Expected type of the domain

This method tries to return the domain of the Variable as a const reference to Ty

Precondition:
Ty should inherit from DomainBase
Ty should be a base class of the domain associted to this Variable
The variable is complete
Exceptions:
VariableException the domain of this variable is undefined
std::bad_cast Ty is not the correct domain
Note:
We use boost utilities to check that Ty inherits from DomainBase. This allows to detect a mistke on compilation time.
See also:
bool isComplete() const
DomainBase &domain() const
